titles.title: Win The Lost At Any Cost

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Souls are crying,
Men are dying.
Won't you lead them to the cross?
Go and find them,
Help to win them,
Win the lost at any cost.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Go out and win,
Rescue from sin,
Day's almost done
low sets the sun.
Souls are crying,
Men are dying,
Win the lost at any cost.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
As we look around us
All the fields are white
Ripened unto harvest

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
And so swiftly comes the night;
Christians must get busy
There is work to do,
Here's an urgent task awaiting you.

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Christ our loving Shepherd,
went out from the fold
Seeking for the stray lamb

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines:
That was lost in darkened cold;
Tender hands of kindness
Raised him from the ground,
Now's the little lost one had been found.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Check your fold my Christian,
Are the children in?
Are there yet some straying,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Lost in blackened fields of sin;
You must go and reach them,
Go without delay,
Soon the shades of night
will end the day.
